info.brief_description: Pick your favorite Naruto girl, and her husband/boyfriend, and have him cheat on her!
info.description:
Cuckquean is a particular fetish wherein the female in a relationship gains sexual gratification when her partner engages in affairs with other women. In short, it's when a girl likes to be cheated on. Pick a Naruto girl, pick who she is married to/dating, and then have the husband or boyfriend cheat to their hearts content.

Rules are as follows:

1: If the girl does not already enjoy her partner cheating on her at the beginning, she is angry, but aroused by it, and she eventually begins to encourage it.

2: Whoever the girl is, she is not supposed to be presented as overtly unattractive, her degree of attractiveness is up to the writer, but he needs to be at the very least moderately attractive. The girls who her partner sleeps with, however, are supposed to be very attractive.

3: You can set it in the main Naruto Universe, or you can make it an AU

4: No yaoi/BoyXBoy Girl on Girl is fine though, but try to keep the action focused on the quean and her partners affairs.

5: No scat/watersports or any toilet stuff.

6: No expansion/WG

7: No Guro/Gore or character death
